statements: SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, market_condition FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT strategy_id, historical_data FROM trading_strategies WHERE market_condition = 'Bullish';
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE market_condition = 'Bearish' ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, market_condition FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%trend%';
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 100;
SELECT strategy_name, market_condition FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id > 50 ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT JSON_VALUE(historical_data,'$.performance_metrics') AS performance_metrics FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%scalping%' ORDER BY strategy_id;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM trading_strategies WHERE market_condition = 'Volatility' LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_strategies FROM trading_strategies WHERE JSON_LENGTH(historical_data,'$.trades') > 10;
SELECT * FROM market_conditions;
SELECT condition_name, condition_description FROM market_conditions WHERE market_condition_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, success_rate FROM trading_strategies WHERE success_rate > 70;
SELECT * FROM market_conditions WHERE condition_name LIKE 'High%';
SELECT market_condition_id, condition_name FROM market_conditions ORDER BY condition_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_conditions WHERE condition_name = 'Bull Market'
SELECT market_condition_id, condition_name FROM market_conditions WHERE market_condition_id = 3
SELECT MAX(market_condition_id) AS max_id FROM market_conditions
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, success_rate FROM trading_strategies WHERE success_rate > 70.00 ORDER BY success_rate DESC
SELECT condition_name, condition_description, COUNT(*) AS total_conditions FROM market_conditions GROUP BY condition_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT id, date, stock_symbol FROM market_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_level FROM trading_strategies WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY closing_price DESC;
SELECT date, stock_symbol, trading_strategy_id FROM historical_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT market_condition FROM market_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, stock_symbol FROM market_data WHERE market_condition = 'Bullish' ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT hd.date, hd.stock_symbol, ts.strategy_name, hd.closing_price FROM historical_data hd JOIN trading_strategies ts ON hd.trading_strategy_id = ts.id WHERE ts.risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY hd.date ASC;

SELECT hd.stock_symbol, ts.strategy_name, hd.closing_price FROM historical_data hd JOIN trading_strategies ts ON hd.trading_strategy_id = ts.id WHERE hd.closing_price > 100 ORDER BY hd.stock_symbol, hd.closing_price DESC;

SELECT hd.date, hd.stock_symbol, ts.strategy_name, hd.closing_price FROM historical_data hd JOIN trading_strategies ts ON hd.trading_strategy_id = ts.id WHERE hd.date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY hd.date DESC, hd.stock_symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketConditions;
SELECT market_name, trading_volume FROM MarketConditions WHERE market_type='Stock';
SELECT * FROM HistoricalData WHERE market_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM TradingStrategies WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT market_name, open_price, close_price FROM MarketConditions JOIN HistoricalData ON MarketConditions.market_id = HistoricalData.market_id WHERE date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MarketConditions WHERE trading_volume > 100000 ORDER BY market_name DESC;
SELECT market_id, market_type FROM MarketConditions WHERE market_type = 'Stock' LIMIT 5;
SELECT market_name, trading_volume FROM MarketConditions WHERE market_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY trading_volume DESC;
SELECT m.market_name, h.date, h.open_price, h.close_price FROM MarketConditions m JOIN HistoricalData h ON m.market_id = h.market_id WHERE h.volume > 10000 ORDER BY h.date ASC;

SELECT a.strategy_name, a.success_rate, h.date FROM TradingStrategies a JOIN AnalysisResults ar ON a.strategy_id = ar.strategy_id JOIN HistoricalData h ON ar.data_id = h.data_id WHERE a.strategy_name LIKE '%Trend%' AND h.close_price > h.open_price ORDER BY h.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM MarketData WHERE trade_volume > 100000 ORDER BY closing_price ASC;
SELECT date, stock_symbol, closing_price FROM MarketData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM TradingStrategies WHERE risk_level < 3 AND accuracy_score > 80;
SELECT strategy_name, accuracy_score FROM TradingStrategies ORDER BY accuracy_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, stock_symbol FROM MarketData WHERE trade_volume < 50000 AND date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT strategy_name, accuracy_score FROM TradingStrategies WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY accuracy_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketConditions WHERE volatility_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND market_trend = 'Bullish';
SELECT strategy_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS average_rating FROM StrategyPerformance GROUP BY strategy_id HAVING average_rating > 4 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
